Sign Up Create an account to log in & use our services. Password Re enter password Phone Address Street Name Location Name District Name By signing up you are also agreeing to comply with our "Terms & Conditions agreement, End-User License Agreement (EULA) and Privacy Policy." NOTE: You can only login, once the verification is done.
About Us Cater Bazar allows you to walk away from the drudgery of bazar shopping and welcome an easy relaxed way of browsing and shopping for groceries and all other cater items. Discover new products and shop for all your bulk grocery & cater needs from the comfort of your home or office. No more getting stuck in traffic jams, paying for parking, standing in long queues and carrying heavy goods – get everything you need, when you need, right at your doorstep. While Cater Bazar takes all due care in ensuring the privacy and integrity of the information you provide, the possibility exists that this information could be unlawfully observed by a third party while in transit over the Internet or while stored on Cater Bazar systems. Cater Bazar accepts no liability should this occur. Terms of use Privacy Policy Cater Bazar takes the confidentiality of personal data seriously. Any visitors to this App should read the terms of use carefully.
